languages.text: "Наместник Токара официально разрешил варить ротгат всем желающим. Также наместник Токара владеет всеми мастерскими по производству самогонных аппаратов на Футфоле. Неофициально, разумеется".
"Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."
languages.original_text: "Наместник Токара официально разрешил варить ротгат всем желающим. Также наместник Токара владеет всеми мастерскими по производству самогонных аппаратов на Футфоле. Неофициально, разумеется".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every still production workshop on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."
"Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every still production workshop on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."
"Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."
"Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."
"Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."

languages.text: “托卡拉总督已经正式允许所有人制造私酿烈酒。此外，落脚港所有用来生产酿酒设施的车间，也都是托卡拉总督的资产。当然，是非官方的。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."

traits.locale_text: “托卡拉总督已经正式允许所有人制造私酿烈酒。此外，落脚港所有用来生产酿酒设施的车间，也都是托卡拉总督的资产。当然，是非官方的。”

languages.text: «Lord Tocara ha dado finalmente el visto bueno para que cualquier persona pueda destilar licor. Lord Tocara es, también, el dueño de todos los talleres que fabrican equipo de destilería en Paso. Aunque no está confirmado, claro está».
languages.original_text: "Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Tocara ha dado finalmente el visto bueno para que cualquier persona pueda destilar licor. Lord Tocara es, también, el dueño de todos los talleres que fabrican equipo de destilería en Paso. Aunque no está confirmado, claro está».

languages.text: 「トカラ卿が、製造者制限のない酒造を公式に認めました。また、トカラ卿はフットフォール中にある蒸留酒造場を全て所有しています。もちろん、これは非公式です」
languages.original_text: "Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."

traits.locale_text: 「トカラ卿が、製造者制限のない酒造を公式に認めました。また、トカラ卿はフットフォール中にある蒸留酒造場を全て所有しています。もちろん、これは非公式です」

languages.text: "Lord Tocara hat offiziell die Erlaubnis erteilt, dass jeder Fusel brennen darf. Lord Tocara besitzt außerdem alle Werkstätten auf Footfall, die Gerätschaften zur Destillation herstellen. Inoffiziell, versteht sich."
languages.original_text: "Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Tocara hat offiziell die Erlaubnis erteilt, dass jeder Fusel brennen darf. Lord Tocara besitzt außerdem alle Werkstätten auf Footfall, die Gerätschaften zur Destillation herstellen. Inoffiziell, versteht sich."

languages.text: « Le seigneur Tocara a officiellement autorisé la préparation de tord-boyaux à tous. Le seigneur Tocara est également propriétaire de tous les ateliers fabriquant du matériel de distillerie sur Castel. De façon non officielle, bien sûr. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur Tocara a officiellement autorisé la préparation de tord-boyaux à tous. Le seigneur Tocara est également propriétaire de tous les ateliers fabriquant du matériel de distillerie sur Castel. De façon non officielle, bien sûr. »

languages.text: "Lord Tocara, herkesin evinde groksöldüren yapabilmesine resmî olarak izin verdi. Ayrıca Binliman'daki alkol damıtma ekipmanı üreten tüm atölyelerin sahibi de Lord Tocara'dır. Resmî olarak değil tabii ki."
languages.original_text: "Lord Tocara has officially permitted rotgut to be made by anyone. Lord Tocara also owns every workshop that makes distillery equipment on Footfall. Unofficially, of course."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Tocara herkesin evinde groksöldüren yapabilmesine resmî olarak izin verdi. Binliman'daki alkol damıtma ekipmanı üreten tüm atölyelerin sahibi de Lord Tocara'dır ayrıca. Resmî olarak değil elbette."
